title: Ticket #4005: Spurious warnings in dedicated schedule with partitionable slots
description:
When the dedicated scheduler sees partitionable slots, it issues the spurious working for each claimed dynamic slot: 

WARNING: unexpected claim/activity state for new dynamic slot slot1_4@chevre.cs.wisc.edu -- ignoring this resource

This condition is expected and just fills the logs
check_ins: 2013-Oct-23 15:03   Check-in [37956]: Remove spurious warning in dedicated scheduler #4005 (By Greg Thain )
creator: gthain
